Slava Ukraine!
That is VERY VERY important what you do guys! We are with you! #StopWar. gonna have widgets on our websites! Slava Ukraine!
üí™üí™üí™
Glory to Ukraine!

Hey! As you know, we are in a state of war with Russia. A few days ago Russians bombarded Kharkiv, a city where my dad grew up. My parents are now in a basement waiting for another air attack. It is not a minor conflict as your media might be saying. It is a war.

I know we've been on Product Hunt with a few products to support Ukraine nowadays and I don't want to spam you, but I feel like for us Product Hunt is one of the platforms that allows to grow international awareness. 

Hunters, we've built this widget so you could easily support Ukrainians nowadays. It is a simple piece of code that would show our widget on your website and make your visitors aware of how they can support. 

Thanks. Glory to Ukraine!

Hi all! I‚Äôm Mikkel, Director of Data Science at Dreamdata. üíª

We‚Äôre really excited to see our newest product Content Analytics now live! 

Here‚Äôs some background of why and how we‚Äôve put the product together üëá

Content Analytics is the result of B2B‚Äôs content marketers' struggle with tying their content efforts to pipeline and revenue.

So far, they‚Äôve been unable to answer the simple question: does my content influence the bottom line.

That‚Äôs mostly because existing tools have only been able to track simple conversions happening in the same session.

Content Analytics is tailored fully to the B2B customer journey. Where there are multiple sessions, by multiple users, on multiple devices, over a period of months.

Dreamdata is able to do this because our platform connects the whole go-to-market ecosystem, to track every session by every user of every account; revealing the end-to-end B2B customer journey.

If you have any questions or feedback about Content Analytics, or how we collect and model our data, I‚Äôm here to help! üòÄ
the dream feature <3

Gamechanger! We've been using it for around 3 months now and it helps us make the right decisions when it comes to marketing. If you are fond of coming up with new ideas and testing them, Dreamdata can give you valuable insight to determine if the campaign is a fail or a pass. When you understand the impact of each marketing campaign, you can make a more informed decision to help your business grow. We are very satisfied so far. B2B companies should give this a try.

Congrats, guys! Our team used the first/last click attribution before. But Dreamdata changed the way we do our marketing campaigns.

Imagine knowing what content works, and what doesn't. Getting the whole attribution view allowed us to scrap the campaigns that were not working so well and focus more on those which gets us more leads and conversion. 

It's a challenge to work with new, complex attribution modelling though. But once you get the hang of it and you set to up using correct data, this tool is something that you would want to integrate in your marketing process.

I see this as a powerful attribution tool. Businesses can easily use this to map revenue and conversion from different marketing campaigns.
Dreamdata can track both paid and unpaid channels so once you've set everything, it can provide crucial information on how much each marketing and campaign is generating, the lenth of the sales cycle, where the sales happen, and more. Marketers who love data will love this tool.

Hi everyone, 

I‚Äôm Steffen, CMO and co-founder at Dreamdata üëã

The whole team at Dreamdata is super excited to be launching our new product Content Analytics.

Content Analytics is a game-changer in the world of B2B content marketing.

We‚Äôve tied content to pipeline and revenue - so content marketers can finally prove the value of their efforts in metrics everyone can understand.

Dreamdata‚Äôs Content Analytics is an account-based data platform and application that measures content influence on pipeline and revenue no matter how long the buying journey.

With Content Analytics you‚Äôll finally be able to:-

Find which content is influencing pipeline and revenue üí∞
Identify which content works best at each stage of your pipeline üóì
Discover how long it takes from content view to pipeline conversion events and revenue ‚è±
Run account-based content marketing campaigns üè¢
Plan and track data-driven content strategies with meaningful KPIs. üìà
And much more‚Ä¶

And you can get started Free right away!

Let us know what you think!

Hey Product Hunt üëã

We‚Äôre thrilled to launch our Snippyly SDK! 

With Snippyly SDK, you can make your app multiplayer in 30 mins. It provides these out of the box capabilities: 
‚ö°Ô∏è UI Components: each feature comes with a beautiful customizable UI component. You can place it like any other HTML tag anywhere in your UI and style it the way you want.
‚ö°Ô∏è APIs: if you don't want to use our UI components, you can use the APIs to access raw data to create your own UI. 
‚ö°Ô∏è Backend Infrastructure: we take care of the entire end to end real time infrastructure & ensure that it's fast, performant and secure. 

It is designed to be:
üî• Platform agnostic:  it works well with popular JS frameworks like React, Angular, Vue etc.
üî• White label: we don't put our branding anywhere and want all our features to feel native to your app.
üî• Fully customizable: you can choose only the features you want and style them the way you want.

Would love to hear the use cases that you have in mind for your app. We‚Äôre super excited to see what you build and look forward to your feedback!

Thanks @mwseibel for hunting us.

Hey Builders and Makers üëã,
@SoleneOudet and I are building Snippyly to make the web multiplayer & collaborative üöÄWe are super exited to launch it today!

During covid, the workplace shifted to a remote first world. But 99% of the apps are still single player and not equipped to address remote collaboration needs. With Snippyly, we will change that.

TEAM:
We‚Äôre a team of ex-Googlers. We‚Äôve built several internal collaboration tools and launched products like AR mode in Google Maps & Search and expanded Google Local Services.

FEATURES:
With Snippyly SDK, you can make your app multiplayer in just 30 mins üî•. You can create asynchronous and real time collaboration experiences for your end users:
1. Presence: See who is online on this page right now.
2. Live cursors:  See each other‚Äôs cursor movement live on the page.
3. Contextual comments: Add google docs like comments, voice notes and tag co-workers.
4. Audio huddles: Start Slack-style spontaneous audio conversations with one click. 
5. Real-time state syncing:  See other people‚Äôs changes live without refreshing the page.

USE CASES:
üì± App builders (e.g. Shopify)
Design and product teams can discuss design & copy changes directly inside the app.

‚úâÔ∏è Email marketing & Survey Tools (eg: Mailchimp)
Marketing and products teams can discuss automated journey configurations directly inside the app.

üìä Analytics platforms (eg: Mixpanel)
Analytics and product teams can investigate spikes or drops in metrics directly inside the app.

Get your API key before March 9th to get a special discount (30% off your first year!).

Please ping us with any feedback, ideas or suggestions you may have. ‚ù§Ô∏è
We can‚Äôt wait to see what you build with this. üöÄ

As a devops engineer, this is a must have. It is a super easy way to build great DevOps process.
It‚Äòs interesting!

Define your desired DevOps tools in a single human-readable YAML config file, and at the press of a button (one single command), you will have your whole DevOps toolchain and SDLC workflow set up. Five Minutes. One Command.

Nobody grew up dreaming of building great DevOps processes, even though they're necessary! We wanted to make it as easy, fast, and simple as possible to  configure, launch and manage a personalized and flexible DevOps toolchain, so we built DevStream as an open source product to do exactly that. 

Monolithic DevOps platforms don't fit most agile teams, One-Size-Fits-All == One-Size-Fits-None. 

DevStream lets you choose the pieces you want, and build your own personalized DevOps platform with none of the operational overhead.

If you're just starting up, DevStream makes it easy to get the right products, processes, connections, and automations in place to scale great engineering. 

If you're already established, DevStream equips you to freshen up and enhance the interoperability of your process. 

Is it sexy? Perhaps not. Is it impactful? We think so! Here's to more building, and less of whatever "Ops" is! ;-)

Greetings PH world & fellow builders üññ! 

I‚Äôm Ross, a founding Accordion and pumped to share something super helpful for the startup community‚Ä¶ especially those focused on scaling revenue through repeatable sales & onboarding processes üìà.

After launching last year, we‚Äôve learned A LOT about what founders and GTM teams need to quickly win and successfully onboard customers. Which brings me to why we‚Äôre all here ü•Åü•Å

To share a gallery of proven sales & onboarding playbooks, curated from the world's top startups and sales/success leaders (Figma, Productboard, YC startups, etc, etc)! üôÄ 

We heard from founders: "I'm not a sales / onboarding expert, how do I build a repeatable, collaborative experience for my customers and hit scaling revenue goals??" "I don't want to start from scratch"

And startup sales leaders: "I need everyone on my team selling like our best rep (proactive, engaging, transparent), how do I align them around our playbook and drive consistency?" "How are others doing this?"

You can now access all of these insights & winning processes, distilled into easy to use playbooks, for free.

Spanning multiple use cases (from sales-led to PLG, and POCs to implementation), and for companies from Seed to hyper growth scale. Whether you‚Äôre looking for customer onboarding guides, mutual action plans, or rep training checklists, we‚Äôve got something for you!

Have a playbook you‚Äôd like to contribute or see added? Email us and let‚Äôs make the world of B2B sales a better place for buyers & sellers :)

Looking forward to thoughtful feedback, comments, and constructive criticism ü§†

Hi everyone, üëã It's a great feeling to be back on PH, this time with a 100% free tool (no email required). Content discovery has been a powerful part of our flagship product ContentStudio 2.0 which has helped our users find and share great content. Now, we've opened the content discovery tool for public to help more people use it more often without needing to sign-up. Here's what you can do with Contentideas.io: ‚úÖFind good quality content to curate on social media or newsletter ‚úÖ See which type of content is getting more engagement ‚úÖGather ideas for your next blog post ‚úÖSee competitor's content performance ‚úÖFind new link building opportunities It's kinda like Buzzsumo but only for blog-style (share-worthy) content. Looking forward to getting feedback and adding more useful features.

Hi everyone! Thanks @chrismessina for the hunt üôèüèª Nautoamate is my second app after Toolbox Pro . I made it because I'm passionate about giving power to people to be able to create their own highly-customised workflows that make them more productive without needing to write a single line of code. I absolutely love Notion - it's one of the most flexible ways for storing and visualising data, which makes it a match made in heaven when paired with Shortcuts - the most intuitive no-code automation tool. I've seen some really creative uses for it so far, some of my favourites: ‚Ä¢ Creating an inventory system using your iPhone as a barcode scanner with Notion as the database backend ‚Ä¢ Personal watch later list, with movies and TV shows being stored with rich metadata ‚Ä¢ Adding new contacts into a CRM using Siri ‚Ä¢ Creating an automatic journalling system which pulls in music listened to that day, workout info, weather etc to create rich Notion pages Some of these I've made into example Shortcuts you can find in the app right now and there'll be lots more I'll be adding in the coming days! Shout if you have any questions ‚úåüèª

Looks on pointüí™üèª

While I love the concept of a book club - i think book recommendations stem from 2 places.
While topics of interest are paramount, it would be great to see a book club app which brings in collections from some well known names / influencers e.g. Gates notes, or what musk reads. The other one is your own network - without one's own network being there it's hard to get a club and conversation going. I recently joined Literal - it's a literal upgrade on goodreads - but still hard to get the engagement in the community going. How are you guys approaching this differently?

Great to see this live! üí• I'm Ste, the lead designer Hardcover and I gotta say that it's been great working with such an amazing team on a product evolving so fast. Check it out and if you have any feedback join the Discord community.

üëã Hey hey Product Hunters!

I‚Äôm Adam, a Co-founder of Hardcover, the social discovery platform for finding new life-changing books.

Last year, Goodreads announced they were discontinuing their API. After using their API for over a decade, I couldn‚Äôt believe it! My years of data would no longer be accessible. I snarkily tweeted that I should build an alternative book platform out of spite for Amazon. 

Nine months, 5 co-founders, 80+ user interviews, and 100s of GB of book data later, we‚Äôre launching our beta and you‚Äôre all invited!

üßô‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Who is Hardcover For

Readers who are constantly on the hunt for new and exciting books. Whether you only read a few books per year or are plowing through dozens each month, no one wants to waste time on books they don‚Äôt love. Hardcover will help you find and keep track of what‚Äôs next on your reading list.

All of your activity on Hardcover can be public, private only to you, or shared with people you follow. Yes, you can be antisocial on our social network too‚Äîwhatever helps you to read more books.

üêâ A Short Story

Many of the readers we‚Äôve talked to have a similar process for finding new books to read. Tell us if this sounds like you or if it doesn‚Äôt.

Whenever you hear about a new book that sparks your curiosity, you search for it. You read a little bit about that book from the top search result‚Äîeither on Amazon or Goodreads. Maybe you read a few reviews, or you make a choice to go in with a fresh mind.

Once you‚Äôre interested in a book the next thought is usually, ‚ÄúWhen do I read it?‚Äù As soon as possible or sometime down the line?

Many readers need a place to keep track of those books‚Äîsomething they do today through Goodreads, in a Google Sheet, or in a bunch of other ways.

At Hardcover, we want to be that place you save all the books you want to read. When you‚Äôre ready to actively seek out new books to read, we‚Äôll show you what your friends are reading, popular lists, and our weekly polls. (ex: ‚ÄúWhat were your favorite childhood books?‚Äù) We also have many more things planned.

We hope you join Hardcover to track what you want to read and stay for the community and book discovery.


üìö What You Can do on Hardcover

Track üìì what you want to read, what you‚Äôve read, and what you‚Äôre reading; including the option to track the date(s) you started and finished a book as well as which format (read or listened).

Confidently üöö  move every book & list in your library from Goodreads to Hardcover.

Follow your üë≠ friends and share what you‚Äôre reading with each other.

Get a üì∞ feed of your friends‚Äô activities and activities for books you‚Äôre interested in.

Create book üèÜ goals‚Äîeither by the number of books or number of pages.

Organize your books into üìö lists and easily find what you‚Äôre looking for.

See üìä stats for lists (and more later) based on a wide variety of data.

Discover books through üìà popular lists, prompts, and social feed.

üìò Join Hardcover Beta

Use the invite code ‚Äúproducthunt‚Äù to activate your account today! Then, say hi by jumping on our Discord or following @hardcoverapp on Twitter. üëã

Hey ProductHunters!!

A big thank you to @de for hunting us!  ¬†

ü§î What is Stand and why did I create it?
Stand provides asynchronous online stand-ups, discussions, mood tracking and accountability for your team.

I primarily built Stand based on my own needs/wants from a product. Leading a small team of designers across multiple time zones, I don‚Äôt want to enforce stand-ups where teams are required to join a call daily. I want the team to be able to focus without interruption but be able to raise questions or concerns in a dedicated space when they need to.

After using Stand for about 4 weeks, it feels great! It hasn‚Äôt completely removed the need for calls (and I didn‚Äôt expect that it would), but it has definitely reduced them and given me a better understanding of what the team are working on, removing blockers and most importantly, how the team are feeling day to day.

üöÄ How long did it take to build?
Around 4 months in total to launch the current MVP here on Product Hunt. This is outside of my busy 9 to 5 role, working across evenings and weekends. I wanted to release an MVP at around the 2 month mark, but overall I am happy with the time it has taken me to design and build Stand from scratch.

üî• Some key features:
Asynchronous stand-ups for your team!
Your team will be reminded to attend the stand-up on the day and time of their choosing (although team admins can also request a time to attend).
All stand-ups have discussions/comments allowing your team to communicate directly and efficiently.
Mood tracking - every team member will be asked how they feel during the stand-up.
Insights - see at a glance your team‚Äôs performance, blockers, questions and moods.
Built with remote teams in mind.
Less time on Zoom or Slack calls.
Happier team members!

ü•≥ 50% off for the Product Hunt community
Use the promo code ProductHunt50 when purchasing a plan to get 50% off the price of a plan forever!

If you have any feedback, I would love to hear it!
Nice idea! Congrats on the launch.
Such a clever idea! Congrats

Hey heey Product Hunt!

What if you could invest in and own digital real estate on your favorite websites? What if you could fund your startup while aligning your community with your upside? What would the Million Dollar Homepage look like, reimagined in a crypto-native way? 

A few Internet friends came together to reflect on these questions. The result is The Modern Billboard Collective ‚Äì the first experiment in tokenized advertising where you can buy ad space represented as NFTs that are freely tradable. 

If you believe any of our websites will succeed and more people will want to visit it in the future, you can buy a little piece of it now - represented as an NFT on a billboard -  and resell it in the future for a likely profit. As a lot owner, you can upload an image + link out to a URL of your choice. 

Want to promote your company or project? Stick your logo in it.
Want to show off your ape avatar and link to your twitter profile? Do your thing.
Want to rent the ad space to someone else and make $? Dream big.

It‚Äôs the benefits of advertising, the potential upside of an investment, and the feel good vibes of patronage ;)

Our first three billboards are live today:
- Startupy: https://startupy.themodernbillboard.com
- Koodos: https://koodos.themodernbillboard.com
- Coinvise: https://coinvise.themodernbillboard.com

Watch a demo here: https://youtu.be/hFe7UpT-XaU

There are only 48 gridlots available on each billboard. 16 are open today at a fixed price of 0.5 ETH. The remaining lots will be available tomorrow at a higher floor price.

We‚Äôve had so much fun building this and would love to hear your thoughts!

A special thank you to @hnshah for hunting us today üéâ
Hiten, you hunted us when Fellow originally launched in 2019, again for Fellow v2.0, and now for Fellow 3.2. It means so much to have you continually support us along our journey!

Now‚Ä¶ Fellow 3.2 ü§©

You may be wondering, how do we figure out what it is we want to build?

If you could imagine the world‚Äôs greatest meeting host as a person, they are amazing at masterfully crafting the best meetings possible. They make meetings:

‚úÖ Productive 
‚úÖ Effective 
‚úÖ Inclusive
‚úÖ A great use of everyone‚Äôs time
‚úÖ Move work forward 

‚Ä¶and when you come out of them, you are completely energized.

Well, we‚Äôre building Fellow, the software, to do all of that for you and for everybody that uses it. 

Fellow is becoming a smart meeting assistant - and we are looking to build the world‚Äôs greatest meeting assistant!

On that note, we‚Äôre so excited to share with you some of the new additions to Fellow in 3.2:
1) Tags and Enhanced search üè∑
2) Sections ‚ö°Ô∏è
3) Meeting timer ‚è∞
4) New meeting feedback modal üéâ
5) Delegated access üîê
6) Objectives enhancements üí´
7) Okta support üí™
8) Guest user enhancements üëã
9) ClickUp integration üÜô

Hey Product Hunt!  üëã  

ü§© Exciting news! We are sharing snippet-based authentication solutions for websites.  ‚ú®

‚≠êÔ∏è Rownd Auth ‚Äì Frictionless authentication and profile management for any website or webapp with a snippet.   We are making this in the open and would love feedback.  


The Problem: 
Authentication is still largely focused on the application and creates a divide across marketing sites (blogs, landing pages, docs) and the actual webapp where the cool stuff happens.  This divide adds needless friction.

== What does Rownd do?  ==
üè†The Rownd Hub (a small widget) is your website‚Äôs authentication and profile tab.  We give end-users a simple way to see their status, what data has been collected, and control over the data.  


‚ö°Ô∏è One snippet for websites and an easy SDK for webapps (mobile app support coming soon).  

‚úÖ Any site.  We work on webflow, wordpress, Jamstack sites fronted by Netlify, custom sites or you can add us to any site you can proxy through cloudflare.  

üåâ Across sites. We can work across your websites. If you have a blog in wordpress and a landing page on webflow, auth will follow the user. 

üó∫Ô∏è User profiles can be created over time across sites and the data is available to the browser for fast customizations and personalizations.

‚ö°Ô∏è No more ‚Äúsign up‚Äù page, get your users into your app faster, let them try what you show them on your marketing pages.

üéä  Privacy first - CCPA and GDPR ready

Why us?
We are a bunch of makers who just got sick of the current auth solutions on the market. They either take too long to set up or they offload profile/PII responsibility back to the developer.  We wanted an all in one solution that we could use for our projects.  

We all come from large IT companies where we did data authentication for some of the largest companies in the US and Europe.  We wanted to take that passion for data security and safety and bring it to the rest of the world.  

What to expect
Everything is snippet based.  We are working on some no-code tools to help set up the auth, but right now you have to modify the actual snippet. We show you how to add auth to any page, how to customize a page based on profile data, and how to send form data to Rownd.   

Give us some feedback!
Please give it a whirl.  We built our onboarding tool in webflow to show you the power of our new auth.  Give it a try!   https://rowndauth.com/producthunt.  We are free for 14 days and then 50% off for the next year if you try us today!  No credit card needed.  We would LOVE feedback.
